header:
<js>
JSON.stringify({
  'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 15; V2304A Build/AP3A.240905.015.A2; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/126.0.6478.71 Mobile Safari/537.36",
  'sec-ch-ua-platform': "\"Android\"",
  'origin': getUrl(),
  'x-requested-with': "cn.mujiankeji.mbrowser",
  'Referer': getUrl(),
  'Accept-Language': "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7"
})
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.kind: .tabvalue@.hide.0@td.2:0:1@text##最后更新：|作品分类：|连载状态：
ruleBookInfo.name: {{@@span.1@text##.*《|》|\（.*\）|\(.*\)}}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result=java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
if(src.match(/VIP章节订阅/)){
	java.toast("❗❗❗【重新登录一下，刷新试试】👻");
}
result
</js>
#content@html||.acontent@html||#YiJianZhan@html
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*本站发布页.*|.*手机请访问.*|.*地址发布页.*|.*书架分类.*|地址发布页.*|.*调出设置选.*|左右翻页阅.*|第(.*?)章.*|八叉|书库|8xsk|org|83.*\.xyz|.*地\`\`\`址.*|５X６X７.*|

ruleExplore.author: td.2@text
ruleExplore.name: a.1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (!String(result)){
	java.toast('❗❗访问频繁，稍后再来👻')
	}else{
		java.getElements('dl@.index@dd,dt')
		}
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
dt,a@text
<js>
result.replace(/八叉书库/,'')
.replace(/八~叉~书~库/,'')
</js>
ruleToc.isVip:
<js>
var result; 
a = java.getString('em@.iconfont@html');
//java.log(a);
if (a!= "") {
  //java.log("🔒");
  result = true;
} else {
  result = null;
  //java.log("字符串为空");
}
result
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let url =eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))+'modules/article/search.php,';
body =`searchtype=all&searchkey=${key}&t_btnsearch=&page=${page}`
post = JSON.stringify({
    "body": String(body),
    "method": "POST"
  })
  url += post
</js>
